text: Marcel Bluwal (25 May 1925 – 23 October 2021) was a French movie director and screenwriter. He directed 40 movies, beginning in 1965. His best known works were Carom Shots (1963), The New Adventures of Vidocq (1971) and À droite toute (2008). Bluwal died on 23 October 2021 in Paris, aged 95.Mort du réalisateur et metteur en scène Marcel Bluwal ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French screenwriters Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Writers from Paris
title: Marcel Bluwal
